titles.title: A bill to designate and expand wilderness areas in Olympic National Forest in the State of Washington, and to designate certain rivers in Olympic National Forest and Olympic National Park as wild and scenic rivers, and for other purposes.
Wild Olympics Wilderness and Wild and Scenic Rivers Act
Wild Olympics Wilderness and Wild and Scenic Rivers Act
Wild Olympics Wilderness and Wild and Scenic Rivers Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats
